means: 多种文化的，反映多种文化的，适合于多种文化的

sentence.Network_en: We live in a multicultural society.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们生活在一个多元文化的社会中。

sentence.Network_en: The school has been attempting to bring a multicultural perspective to its curriculum.
sentence.Network_cn: 这所学校已经在尝试将一种多元文化视角引入其课程。

sentence.Network_en: They work hard for a multiracial and multicultural society and sexism.
sentence.Network_cn: 她们为拥有一个男女平等、各民族平等共处、多元文化共存共荣的未来社会努力奋斗.

entry.tran: 融合(或包含)多种文化的;多元文化的
entry.def: Multicultural means consisting of or relating to people of many different nationalities and cultures.

example.ex: ...children growing up in a multicultural society...
example.tran: 在多元文化社会中长大的孩子们

example.ex: The school has been attempting to bring a multicultural perspective to its curriculum.
example.tran: 这所学校已经在尝试将一种多元文化视角引入其课程。

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or including several cultures;

auth_sentence.content: These towns weren't multicultural; they were bicultural.

stems_affixes.word_buile: multi很多,很多+cultural文化的→adj.多种文化的
multi很多,很多+directional方向的→adj. 多方向的
multi很多,很多+form形式→adj.多种多样的
multi很多,很多+lingual语言的→adj. 多种语言的
multi很多,很多+media媒介→adj.多媒体的 n.多媒体, 多媒体的采用
multi很多,很多+ple→多的→多功能的

Sentence.sentence: The RA of two years added that while some conflicts "provided more multicultural acceptance and melding (融合)," there were also "jarring cultural confrontations.
